item.title: Automotive Social-First Video Content for TikTok & Instagram Reels - Upwork
item.description:
We are on the hunt for an engaging creator to help create some social-first video content for our brand channels. You must be self-motivated, be an excellent storyteller, understand and follow trends, and have experience shooting and editing social video content.

Specifically, we are seeking creators to translate our long-form written content into snackable social media posts. The TrueCar Blog has hundreds of posts aimed at making car buying and car ownership easier and more fun for everyone. You will work closely with our marketing team to collaborate on storytelling and final outputs.

The tone of these videos should be a mix of relatable, entertaining and helpful.

Responsibilities:
-Craft video ideas based using TrueCar’s blog content based on trends/seasonal topics
-Shoot video content, manage camera/ microphone setup and editing
-Create on-brand, attention-grabbing, user-generated video talking to TrueCar’s benefits.
-Use platform best practices and keep up with the latest video trends.

The Right Person:
-Natural born storyteller and creative.
-Knowledge of cars / automotive is a plus.
-Knowledge of cultural trends and know what will get a reaction.
-Well-versed in creating video for social media platforms; TikTok, Instagram and YouTube shorts.
-Must be results-oriented and kinda obsessed with “likes” and “video views.”
-Great communicator and able to adapt to different video styles based on creative performance.
-Must own and be knowledgeable with video and microphone equipment. As well as editing software.
-A keen eye for detail and a critical mind. The ability to listen to others and to work well as part of a team.

Compensation: $150/video on a per video basis.

Budget: $150
Posted On: July 01, 2024 19:01 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:TikTok, Instagram, Video Editing, Social Media Content, Social Media Content Creation
Skills: TikTok, Instagram, Video Editing, Social Media Content, Social Media Content Creation
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Growth Partner - Upwork
item.description:
I'm looking for someone to support me in growing my YouTube channel.

I'm roughly at 350 subscribers and I'm looking to elevate the channel in content production and how I serve my audience.

I'm in the online marketing niche and I am talking about email marketing at the moment.

I primarily need someone to support me with video editing, and Thumbnail creation with a focus on quality and increasing engagement.

A bonus would be to have someone to support me with audience research/strategy, so I can create videos my market need and want as well as scripting (more like outlines versus word-for-word scripts).

Budget: $500
Posted On: July 01, 2024 18:59 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Video Editing, YouTube Thumbnail, Research & Strategy, Scripting
Skills: Video Editing, YouTube Thumbnail, Research & Strategy, Scripting
Country: United States

item.title: Video Editing and Creative Direction for Social Media and YouTube - Creator and Ecommerce - Upwork
item.description:
I'm looking for a content creation specialist to assist in creating a social media presence for myself and my business. This will encompass 2 main initiatives:

1. Positioning my personal brand as a creator via short and long-form video content, on:
- Instagram
- Youtube
- TikTok

2. Promote my e-commerce businesses via short and long-form video content, on:
- Instagram
- TikTok

I am looking for someone who is efficient as a video editor has some experience producing or creating video content and can help create the social media strategy as well.

I look forward to hearing from you.

Hourly Range: $25.00-$36.00

item.title: Creative YouTube Video Producer with Voiceover - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a professional and creative YouTube video producer who can bring our script to life. The ideal candidate will have experience in creating engaging and visually appealing videos for YouTube, with the ability to incorporate voiceover and clips. The videos will be based on a provided script and will need to be edited and polished to produce high-quality content.

Key Skills:
- Proficient in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
- Strong storytelling and creative skills
- Ability to create visually appealing graphics and animations
- Experience with voiceover recording and editing
- Attention to detail and ability to deliver projects on time

This is a medium-sized project with a duration of 1 to 3 months. We are looking for an intermediate-level video producer who can work independently and bring fresh ideas to the table. If you have a passion for creating engaging YouTube content, we would love to hear from you!


Posted On: July 01, 2024 18:55 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Audio Editing, Voice-Over, Video Production, Video Editing, Voice Acting
Skills: Audio Editing, Voice-Over, Video Production, Video Editing, Voice Acting
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Videographer / Editing - Upwork
item.description:
I’m looking for a long-term videographer that can record 2 videos for all of our clients based all around the US. One video is a franchise offering video, from around 3-5 minutes long. The other is a testimonial video about our company that is at most 1 minute long. Both videos will need editing. Both videos will be shot at 1 location anywhere between 2-5 hours of shooting. If you can travel multiple states in the US for $1,000 total that would be great. If not, where would you be able to shoot for that price?
Here is a sample of what we’re looking for: (link removed)
Sometimes our clients want voiceover and sometimes they are able to speak the whole video themselves. Would this be an extra cost?
**VIDEOGRAPHER MUST HAVE TELEPROMPTER**

Budget: $1,000

Category: Videography
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Videography

item.description:

item.title: Freelance Creative Motion Designer for Event-Based Social and Digital Campaigns - Upwork
item.description:
We are a community-focused brand known for hosting transformative events and creating engaging social media campaigns on platforms such as Instagram, TikTok, and beyond.

Job Description
We are seeking a talented Freelance Creative Motion Designer for a long-term collaboration. The ideal candidate will craft compelling motion graphics and animations for our community and sponsor-driven social media campaigns. This role involves working closely with our marketing team to ideate and execute visually creative content that spans social media, EDMs, WhatsApp marketing, and website channels.

Responsibilities
• Design and animate engaging content for social media, EDMs, WhatsApp marketing, and website channels.
• Collaborate with the marketing team to develop innovative concepts for events and social campaigns.
• Create visually appealing and shareable content for platforms including Instagram and TikTok.
• Ensure all designs align with brand guidelines and campaign objectives.
• Drive conversions through compelling and creative visual storytelling.
• Participate in quarterly major event and social campaign launches.
• Deliver one to three key visuals per event and social campaign, with more than 10 adaptations for various contexts and channels.

Requirements
• Proven experience in motion design and animation, with a strong emphasis on social media and digital marketing.
• Strong portfolio showcasing community-driven and sponsor-driven social campaigns, particularly on Instagram and TikTok.
• Proficiency in design software (e.g., After Effects, Illustrator).
• Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
• Ability to meet deadlines and work independently.
• Availability for long-term engagement, with one major event and social campaign launch every quarter.
• Competitive and community-driven rates.
• Creative and unconventional thinking

How to Apply
Please send your CV and attach your work portfolio

NO TEMPLATE DESIGNS!


Posted On: July 01, 2024 18:50 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
Skills:Advertisement, Motion Graphics, Graphic Design, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe After Effects, Instagram, Video Editing, Illustration, Social Media Marketing
Skills: Advertisement, Motion Graphics, Graphic Design, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe After Effects, Instagram, Video Editing, Illustration, Social Media Marketing
Country: Singapore
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor/Manager for Linkedin & Youtube professional account (people operations consulting) - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a long-term partner to help me with video editing & posting to Linkedin & Youtube (mainly shorts) - 2-3 times/week. As we grow together and learn more about each other, there’s potential for you to manage my LinkedIn account with an increased rate.

About You:

- You prefer Linekdin to any other social media, and you have an understanding how the platform works. You're not just doomscrolling, but picking up the trends there.
- Your English is fluent and conversational.
- You're well-rounded to be able to grasp the essence of long-form content and repurpose it into engaging short-form videos.
- You work with AI video editing tools to be able to generate 5-6 short clips out of a 20 min webinar within an hour.

How to apply: 1. Visit my Linkedin Kate Laptieva , get to know what I do
2. Send me 2-3 links to short form video content (business topics) that you have created for another expert or yourself (preferably on LinkedIn)
3. Start with 123, and only list the AI tools you work with

I AM LOOKING FORWARD TO WORKING WITH YOU!
Thanks for applying!

Hourly Range: $5.00-$10.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 18:35 UTC
Category: General Virtual Assistance
Skills:Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content Creation, Virtual Assistance, Social Media Management, Video Editing, LinkedIn
Skills: Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content Creation, Virtual Assistance, Social Media Management, Video Editing, LinkedIn
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Phoenix AZ - Videographer Needed for Company Video - Upwork
item.description:
PHOENIX, AZ ONLY

We need a videographer to come to travel to our customers office to shoot a 15 minutes of video footage for a digital avatar. The footage will have to be edited.

Required Equipment:
- Professional full-frame camera
- Tripod
- Green screen
- 3 lights

Looking for a videographer with experience who can be efficient setting up the equipment and returning the footage to us.

Budget: $500
